title: In The Raw Sprouting Center
description: Carries live raw foods, specializing in fresh wheatgrass, a variety of crisp sprouts, freshly made almond milks, vegan cheeses, master tonic, kombucha, freshly squeezed juices, dried fruits, vegan dips, raw pies, raw cheesecakes, raw brownies, chocolate cereal, freezies and dairy-free & sugar-free ice creams. Also sells fresh turmeric root. New products are introduced often. Also carries juicers, dehydrators, blentec blenders and easy-green sprouters.
